name: Savory Spaghetti Sauce Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 Tbsp minced fresh basil or 1 teaspoon dried basil
2 tsp minced fresh oregano or 3/4 teaspoon dried oregano

recipeInstructions.text: In a Dutch oven, cook ground beef and onion until meat is no longer pink and onion is tender; drain. Add the next eight ingredients; bring to a boil.
Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 1 hour, stirring occasionally. Remove the bay leaf. Serve with spaghetti. Garnish with oregano if desired. Yield: 4-6 servings (about 1 quart).
